text: Sinan Al-Shabibi (; 1 July 1941 â€“ 8 January 2022) was an Iraqi economist and politician. He was the governor of the Central Bank of Iraq from September 2003 to October 2012. Al Shabibi died on 8 January 2022, at the age of 80. ==Related pages== *List of scientists from Asia ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Iraqi politicians Category:Economists Category:People from Baghdad Category:Alumni of the University of Bristol
